name: B.O.A.T. (GDPanda, tuslir, Toffe Helstad, Spillutvikler, 1cebell, maren)
name_original: B.O.A.T. (GDPanda, tuslir, Toffe Helstad, Spillutvikler, 1cebell, maren)
description:
👎 You’re on a boat with your friends, but the boat sucks. 👎 

👍 Luckily, your friends have suggestions for how to make it suck less. 👍
🧭 Navigate through different islands to find resources, 🧭
🌜 to help your friends build the boat of your dreams. 🌛
⛵ The boatest of all time. ⛵

Made during 48 hours on for Godt og Jammet 1, with the theme Remix/Remake!

How to play: Find the right island to fulfill your friends' quests. Press E at the helm to switch between walking mode/cruising mode. Press SPACE while next to an island in cruising mode to collect resource! Press TAB to open/close map and speedometer. Enjoy your cool boat!

Music by Alva Grytting Sunde
